title: feat: Add LTX-2 video generation model
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Integrates the LTX-2 video generation model, enabling high-quality video creation with audio support.
gist.impact: Users can now generate 1-10 second videos with audio using the new LTX-2 model at highly competitive rates.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee as a film director on a cozy retro movie set. The 'LTX-2' model is represented as a glowing vintage cinema camera or editing suite. The scene captures the magic of creating moving pictures.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee holding a tiny director's clapperboard next to a glowing vintage cinema camera labeled 'LTX-2'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites of film reels and a pixelated editing monitor. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
